workflow.name: Automate LinkedIn content creation with OpenAI, Notion, and Google Slides
workflow.description:
What it is
An automated LinkedIn content system that takes a simple form (idea + optional file), generates LinkedIn posts with OpenAI, stores them in Notion, builds Google Slides carousels, and auto-publishes posts (text, image, or document) to LinkedIn on a schedule while keeping Notion in sync.

Setup steps

1. Connect integrations: link your Notion database, LinkedIn account, Google Drive/Slides, OpenAI, and Gmail in n8n.

2. Configure the form: set up the ‚ÄúLinkedIn Post Generator‚Äù form with the idea field and optional file upload.

3. Map AI outputs: wire the OpenAI nodes so they write post title, funnel stage, and content into your Notion ‚ÄúLinkedIn Auto Posts‚Äù database.

4. Enable carousel flow: connect Notion ‚Üí OpenAI ‚Üí Google Slides template ‚Üí Google Drive copy ‚Üí Notion update for ‚ÄúCreate Carousel‚Äù items.

5. Set scheduling: use the Schedule Trigger + Notion filters (‚ÄúReady for Post‚Äù + Scheduled Date) to pick which posts go out each hour.

6. Publish & track: send posts to LinkedIn (text, image, or document), then update Notion status to ‚ÄúPosted‚Äù and, if needed, send yourself an email reminder for manual carousel actions.

parameters.content:
## Generate LinkedIn posts

Checks if an idea was provided. 

No idea: generates 10 generic posts across funnel stages (BOFU, MOFU TOFU)
With idea: creates 3 targeted posts.

parameters.formDescription: This LinkedIn Post Generator creates a specific post. If left empty, it will generate 10 new posts.

values.content:
‚úÖ SYSTEM PROMPT: Generate 10 LinkedIn Posts with Metadata
You are a professional LinkedIn storyteller for a founder who offers AI automation services to small B2B companies.
Your task is to generate 10 high-performing LinkedIn posts at once.
Each post should follow the correct funnel logic: TOFU, MOFU, or BOFU.
Use the founder‚Äôs transformation and offer to drive relevance and conversions.

üßæ Output Format (CSV-Ready)
Each post must be structured as a row with:

Post Title: Compelling, curiosity-driven, and aligned with funnel stage

Funnel Stage: One of TOFU, MOFU, or BOFU

Full Post Text: 10‚Äì18 line, story-based, short-paragraph post optimized for LinkedIn

Format output into a JSON with following format:
{
"Post Title": "",
"Funnel Stage":"",
"Full Post Text",""
}

üîß Funnel Stage Breakdown
60% TOFU (6 posts): Emotional or relatable pain points, founder stories, big shifts, awareness

30% MOFU (3 posts): Educational how-to, frameworks, tools, checklists

10% BOFU (1 post): Clear offer, urgency, client result

‚úçÔ∏è Style Guidelines
Short paragraphs (1‚Äì3 lines each)

No emojis (or max 1, only if it reinforces tone)

No em-dashes

Use plain, clear, confident language

Speak directly to founders/CEOs of small B2B companies

Promote the offer: ‚ÄúAI Opportunity Audit‚Äù or a clear automation framework

parameters.content:
## Create carousel

Monitors Notion for "Create Carousel" status. Generates slide content with OpenAI, populates a Google Slides template, and updates Notion with the carousel link.

## Publish to LinkedIn

Checks every minute for scheduled posts ready to publish. 

Detects if there's an image or document attached, posts to LinkedIn in the correct format, and updates the status to "Posted."

values.content:
=‚úÖ SYSTEM PROMPT: Generate 3 LinkedIn Posts with Metadata
You are a professional LinkedIn storyteller for a founder who offers AI automation services to small B2B companies.
Your task is to generate 3 high-performing LinkedIn posts at once based on user's idea.
Each post should follow the correct funnel logic: TOFU, MOFU, or BOFU.
Use the founder‚Äôs transformation and offer to drive relevance and conversions.

üßæ Output Format
Each post must be structured as a row with:

Post Title: Compelling, curiosity-driven, and aligned with funnel stage

Funnel Stage: One of TOFU, MOFU, or BOFU

Full Post Text: 10‚Äì18 line, story-based, short-paragraph post optimized for LinkedIn

Format output into a JSON with following format:
{
"Post Title": "",
"Funnel Stage":"",
"Full Post Text",""
}

üîß Funnel Stage Breakdown
TOFU: Emotional or relatable pain points, founder stories, big shifts, awareness

MOFU: Educational how-to, frameworks, tools, checklists

BOFU: Clear offer, urgency, client result

‚úçÔ∏è Style Guidelines
Short paragraphs (1‚Äì3 lines each)

No emojis (or max 1, only if it reinforces tone)

No em-dashes

Use plain, clear, confident language

Speak directly to founders/CEOs of small B2B companies

Promote the offer: ‚ÄúAI Opportunity Audit‚Äù or a clear automation framework

=# Prompt
You are a helpful, intelligent writing assistant. Your task it to convert the user's input into the following format. Only use input from the user as a source.

The slides have to follow a logical order and you are telling a story and giving actions, take away and value.

## Output Format
Each post must be structured with:

PostTitle: Use bold, clear headlines as a hook. 3-8 words
PostSubtitle: Add an intriguing question or promise value, 3-8 words
PointOneTitle
PointOneSubtitle: Keep sentences short and skimmable. Add breakline between sentences
PointTwoTitle
PointTwoSubtitle: Keep sentences short and skimmable. Add breakline between sentences
PointThreeTitle
PointThreeSubtitle: Keep sentences short and skimmable. Add breakline between sentences
CTA: brief, clear prompt‚Äîe.g., ‚ÄúLike if you agree‚Äù or ‚ÄúComment your take‚Äù‚Äîideally <50‚ÄØchars)

Format output into a JSON with following format:

{
  "PostTitle": "",
  "PostSubtitle": "",
  "PointOneTitle": "",
  "PointOneSubtitle": "",
  "PointTwoTitle": "",
  "PointTwoSubtitle": "",
  "PointThreeTitle": "",
  "PointThreeSubtitle": "",
  "CTA": ""
}



## Rules
- Use a spartan, casual tone of voice.
- Be to-the-point but professional -assume you're writing to a sophisticated audience.
- Speak directly to founders/CEOs of small B2B companies
- Ensure that all fields are filled out. Do not miss a field or leave any variables empty.
- Stick to one main point per slide to maintain clarity.
- No em-dashes
= 10‚Äì50 words per slide

Your task is to generate a google slide deck caroussel for LinkedIn by using user'sinput. This slidedeck should be highly customized, specific, and high quality. Considering we are going to be sending it immediately after you're done.


# Context
We are an automation no-code agency that develops systems revolving around growth and revenue ops, etc.

The linkedin carousel template we're using has many fields. You must return these fields in one JSON object.

NO em dashes


Use this format as an example:
{
  "PostTitle": "Automate 80% of Ops for B2B Teams",
  "PostSubtitle": "Discover Our 6-Part Framework",
  "PointOneTitle": "",
  "PointOneSubtitle": "Assess current processes and identify automation opportunities.",
  "PointTwoTitle": "Evaluate Your Process",
  "PointTwoSubtitle": "Plan it ahead",
  "PointThreeTitle": "Build the system",
  "PointThreeSubtitle": "Develop automation solutions tailored to your B2B operations.",
  "CTA": "Ready to Automate?"
}

parameters.content:
## Upload file to Drive

Checks if a file was submitted with the form. 

If yes, uploads it to Google Drive and saves the shareable link.

## Save posts to Notion

Creates a Notion page for each generated post with all metadata. 

If a file was uploaded, adds the file link to the page.

## How it works

This workflow automates your LinkedIn content from idea to post.

**Generate content:** Submit an idea through a form. Get 10 generic posts or 3 custom posts saved to Notion.

**Create carousels:** Mark a post as "Create Carousel" to generate slides in Google Slides automatically.

**Publish automatically:** Posts are published to LinkedIn on schedule and marked as complete.

## Setup steps

1. **Connect accounts:** Link OpenAI, Notion, Google Drive, Google Slides, and LinkedIn to n8n.

2. **Create Notion database:** Add fields for title, funnel stage, content, status, type, idea, and file URL.

3. **Add Google Slides template:** Create a carousel template for automated population.

4. **Set up form:** Configure fields for idea input and file upload.

5. **Enable triggers:** Activate Notion and schedule triggers.

6. **Test:** Submit a test idea and verify it works end-to-end.

user.name: Kean
user.bio: GTM agency using N8N, Clay and other super tech tools to enable revenue teams for scalable growth!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
